data.text:
@viveksworld @EricTopol @NEJM @UKHSA I keep seeing conflicting/confusing stuff.
In January 2022 the CDC recommended getting another booster at 5 months.
Then in February they were like "boosters continue to offer high levels of protection."

January 2022:
https://t.co/y0fqFJcIJx

Feb 2022:
https://t.co/w0whU40aSk
@EricTopol @NEJM @UKHSA @erictopol How long does this VE from booster last for? Both for symptomatic infection (wanes quicker) vs severe disease
@Antonio_Caramia @EricTopol @NEJM @UKHSA VE against what though? Is it against symptomatic infection or severe disease that wanes?

@EricTopol @NEJM @UKHSA Medically speaking, this is all b*******. What doctors, patients, and nurses need to know is the "net treatment benefit for the patient" using the outcome measure most important for the patient. Evidence-based medicine requires personalized medicine. Side effects and side ben.. https://t.co/bn0p1wEdZD
@Antonio_Caramia @EricTopol @NEJM @UKHSA Graph is from the most recent UKHSA vaccine surveillance report. I think a new weekly report is due out tomorrow. https://t.co/2yewRXCs51

@Antonio_Caramia @EricTopol @NEJM @UKHSA That data's a bit old, but the newer data isn't much more encouraging. 3 doses of Pfizer are at ~39% after 15 weeks & manifestly still declining. I'm now 19 weeks out from my 3rd dose, so I expect my protection against symptomatic infection is ~25% & falling. https://t.co/ctQtAgAeHS
@Antonio_Caramia @EricTopol @NEJM @UKHSA Vaxxed and boosted with Pfizer 23 wks. ago.  I never hear it being talked about how low the effectiveness must be now.

@EricTopol @NEJM @UKHSA Pandemia Covid19 Chile
Sobre 20.000 contagios nuevos diarios
Más de 100 muertos al día
Coronavac no protege de muertes ni complicaciones variante Omicron
Recibir 2do refuerzo Pfizer/Moderna es clave
No es tiempo aún de retornar a clases presenciales
https://t.co/LanzS6aPZt
@EricTopol @NEJM @UKHSA Glad I didn't play with it and get addicted.
